A '''resin brick''' is an [[item]] used to create [[resin bricks]]. It can also be used as a [[smithing]] ingredient, giving orange details to pieces of [[armor]].

== Obtaining ==

=== Smelting ===
{{Smelting
|Resin Clump
|Resin Brick
|0.1
}}
